nodes.text: The Veccacopia system was an Outer Rim Territories star system that lay within the Tunka sector. It contained the astronomical object Veccacopia, which was the homeworld of the sentient Cacop species.
The Veccacopia system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square I-19.
